official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on November 18, 1979, as "National Family Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week beginning on November 18, 1978, as "National Family Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on November 18, 1979, as "National Family Week".
